prompts: Create a cute grass-type Pokemon that looks like a fluffy cloud with green leaves.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a soft, cotton-like body and can scatter pollen everywhere.
Design a whimsical little creature that thrives in sunny, grassy areas and has a cheerful demeanor.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a small, fluffy cotton ball with vibrant green accents.
Show me a playful, tiny Pokemon that loves to frolic in flower-filled meadows.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of springtime with its cottony appearance and green features.
Give me a Pokémon that can blend seamlessly into the grassy terrain, evoking a sense of calm.
